page.title: 08Trade in Greatworth
page.content: Greatworth has one shop which is open six days a week. It sells fresh fruit, milk, bread and vegetables. It also stocks a wide range of groceries. Frozen food is also available. The shop also acts as a Post Office and villagers collect their state benefits from this place. Mobile traders also visit the village. A butcher, grocer and fishmonger call on houses each week. Weekly shopping is carried out in nearby Banbury which holds an outdoor market on Thursdays and Saturdays. Coventry, Oxford, Milton Keynes and Northampton are also popular shopping places. The village also has a public house named The Inn. This provides meals,bar snacks and alcoholic refreshment. A small nursery produces plants for sale on the edge of the village.
